name: BRuRo
description:
You are a robot exploring strange worlds.  You have to venture as far  as possible. For that you have to build your own path with the Tetris-Blocks. For traveling you need energy, so for recharging you have to reach checkpoints and collect batteries without falling down or run out of energy.

How to play:

Robot:

W - run forward

A - turn left

S - run backwards

D - turn right

Space - jump

Blocks:

Arrow right - move block right

Arrow left - move block left

Arrow down - move block down

Arrow up - rotate block
